name: 書報討論
goals: The course aims to develop students’ abilities on database search, papers reading, and oral presentation. The students will also be inspired by the academic research while listen to peers reports and discussion.
syllabus:
第一週 課程介紹         Week 1 Introduction

第二週 文獻與資料庫搜尋 Week 2 Literature and database

第三週 如何閱讀文獻     Week 3 How to read a scientific paper

第四週 如何準備PPT     Week 4 How to prepare a PPT of seminar talk

第五週 摘要與文獻撰寫   Week 5 How to write an abstract and reference

第六週 學生口頭報告     Week 6 Student presentation

第七週 學生口頭報告     Week 7 Student presentation

第八週 學生口頭報告     Week 8 Student presentation

第九週 學生口頭報告     Week 9 Student presentation

第十週 學生口頭報告     Week 10 Student presentation

第十一週 學生口頭報告   Week 11 Student presentation

第十二週 學生口頭報告   Week 12 Student presentation

第十三週 學生口頭報告   Week 13 Student presentation

第十四週 學生口頭報告   Week 14 Student presentation

第十五週 學生口頭報告   Week 15 Student presentation

第十六週 綜合討論       Week 16 Discussion

第十七週 彈性補充教學   Week 17 Optional

第十八週 彈性補充教學   Week 18 Optional
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
